source: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_SEQ_00<tab>An Oroniri hunter would like to study your combat style.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_SEQ_00<tab>明けの玉座のオロニル族の狩人は、異国の戦士に興味があるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_000<tab>I gather from your peculiar attire that you are not from around here?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_000お前、変わった格好をしているということは、異国の戦士だな？
どうやら、まさに俺が求めていた人材のようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_001<tab>Very good. I have always been curious to observe a warrior from outside the Steppe in battle. You see, as a hunter, it is my duty to defend the Dawn Throne and the surrounding perimeter─especially against creatures known as chaochus.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_001俺の役目は、を狩り、
縄張りの安全を守ることなのだが、
よければ、お前の戦い方を見せてほしいのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_002<tab>As such, I am constantly searching for ways to improve my own fighting technique. I feel there is a lot I can learn by observing you. Please, if you are willing, meet me to the southwest of here. There you can demonstrate to me your combat style.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_002異国の戦い方を学べば、より効率的に狩りができると思ってな。
南西の岩場あたりが、の生息地だ。
そこで待っているゆえ、狩りの準備を整えてきてほしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_010<tab>This area is populated by chaochus. Please go and slay two. I shall carefully observe your movements from here.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_010うむ、準備は万端なようだな。
さっそく、お前の戦いぶりを見せてもらうとしよう。
周辺にいる「」を、2匹ほど仕留めてみろ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_011<tab>Please quickly go and slay two chaochus for me. I am anxious to see how you fight and if any of your techniques might be applied to my own.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_011周辺にいる「」を、2匹ほど仕留めてみろ。
より効率的な狩り方を、お前の戦いぶりから学びたいのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_020<tab>Over the course of my lifetime I have been exposed to many combat styles but never have I met anyone who fights with such fluidity and grace.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_020ふむ……思ったよりも、鮮やかな戦いぶりだった。
見るべき価値があったのは、幸いといえるだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_021<tab>Today I have gained some valuable insight into the art of war and for that I would like to gift you with something of equal worth. Please, follow me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_021価値ある働きには、価値あるものを……。
礼を渡すゆえ、明けの玉座まで同行願いたい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_030<tab>The more I replay the scene of you facing the chaochus, the more I am impressed with just how refined your skills are. You even somehow managed to slay the creatures while leaving the flowers blossoming from their heads untouched.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_030お前の戦いを思い返していたのだが、実に興味深かった。
あの動きを参考にすれば、花を傷つけずに、
を狩ることもできよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_031<tab>Chaochu flowers are extremely precious to us and we often offer them up to Father Azim during certain ceremonies. Though, should they be missing even a single petal, it would ruin the gesture entirely.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_031やつらの頭に咲く花は、一族の儀式にて、
太陽神アジムへの供物として捧げるものでな。
その際には、花びら一枚とて欠けてはならぬのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_032<tab>While I have little difficulty in taking down these monsters, I often end up destroying their flowers in the process. I am confident that in incorporating a few of your techniques this can change.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_032俺でも、稀に花を傷つけてしまうことがあったのだが、
お前の戦い方を採り入れれば、あるいは……。
うむ、実に有意義なひとときであった。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_033<tab>I shall not forget the knowledge you have bestowed upon me today. You have my sincerest thanks.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ603_02781_ORONIRHUNTER02781_000_033優れた戦士には、相応の敬意を払うとしよう。
感謝するぞ、異国の戦士よ。
